channel.title: So new Noble... is still pretty bad
channel.description:
Still really boring, but now people can randomly say horrible crap to you and you can't report them because you never know who they were.
Maybe let them talk back to people at night at least?

item.title: So new Noble... is still pretty bad
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Yeah, PM and Maid was sort of boring, but at least useful sometimes.

Then again, no one ever whispers lately, so who knows. It was the best version so far.

Read full topic
item.source: So new Noble... is still pretty bad

item.title: So new Noble... is still pretty bad
item.dc:creator: sunchamber
item.description:
Nay, the entire class should just be reworked. Hearsay is a completely useless ability and I’m not sure why they’re trying to add RNG-based abilities, completely goes against the flavor of the game.

Two patches ago was the best Noble was, with Maid Spy and Private Matter. Right now Nobles are nearly useless.

Read full topic
